label: 三種愛
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The three attachments were (1) to one's realm (kyōgaiai), i.e. to one's family, house, possessions, etc.; (2) to one's corporeal life (jitaiai); and (3) to one's future life (tōshōai) (p. 763n).  [境界愛、自体愛、当生愛]
